task_name: Check the status of your iPhone repair on apple.

description.thought: To check the status of an iPhone repair on Apple's website, I need to navigate to the Apple support website and find a way to track the repair status.  Since there's no accessibility tree or previous trace, I'll start by going to the Apple support website.
description.action: Navigating to Apple's support website (https://support.apple.com/) to initiate the repair status check.
